title: Question:
author: 11h11
content: https://bafkreie37nyx43sw4ewa76ixyq4t6o6oxqahqxwquwkhghjo33fdylla6e.ipfs.w3s.linkHello everyone,11h11.io project offers you the opportunity to record your dreams and manifest them as unique NFT on the blockchain.This project revolves around the special time of 11:11, symbolizing a moment of magic and the ability to immortalize your wishes.Whether it's a creative idea, artwork, or written text, this project allows you to capture your dreams within the blockchain.From the very first occurrence of 11:11, you become part of a mysterious moment in time, where the potential to fulfill your desires resides.The project acknowledges that the 11:11 time window is fleeting and insufficient to fulfill all dreams.However, it represents a unique period where you can emphasize and recognize your wishes as something extraordinary.Next featureCurrently, we are continuing to develop a project where users who own the project's NFT will be able to claim one subdomain for each desire, for example, vitalik.11h11.eth, with full ENS subdomain control rights.In the first stage, only Ethereum network users will be able to claim, while Polygon network users will have to wait...I would like to hear your feedback on the project idea. Perhaps you have some suggestions, please share your thoughts.And if you find the idea really interesting, try to claim an NFT and/or tell your friends about the new project or share it on Twitter(X) with your buddies.If you don't know what is Ethereum Name Service(ENS) you can learn more here:ens web: https://ens.domainsdocs: https://docs.ens.domainstwitter(X): https://twitter.com/ensdomainsens marketplace: https://ens.visionWe've put together some helpful guides for you to get setup with our product quickly and easily.Make a wish guide:Step 1:https://bafkreifgzf3z5kjwn4qtrm65nyxi22ixf4wtzq3g5bb5yhcaf2pvi7ahsy.ipfs.w3s.link/Step 2:https://bafkreibtfio5ahhfrsff57lyfcy5ox4q7xvajxjzqd2od3cjq5g32jkf4i.ipfs.w3s.link/Step 3:https://bafkreihxnp6ltoac7sclxcjyh5edcreugojygsp7crbv7yol23kzx4z72q.ipfs.w3s.link/Step 4:https://bafkreihpf2pqkhpe5ex3nf2veeg3fofo2nn2ggzk2ha5fbqlsfvt3syjoq.ipfs.w3s.link/Official web: https://11h11.ioOfficial twitter(X): https://twitter.com/11h11ethLearn more: https://docs.11h11.ioNetwork: Ethereum, PolygonMake a wish 11:1111h11.eth

comments.author: 11h11
comments.body: In the coming years, blacksmiths will have the opportunity to obtain interesting *.11h11.eth subdomains.
